lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to middle school students.  My students are great and I enjoy my job immensely.

lenders.name: Kimberly

My number one dream is to do charity work, or set up a foundation of our own, we just don't have the means at this point in our lives,  this is a perfect way to begin.  Im so excited to get started and help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: Management of a medicial facility. I do everything from answer the phone, to admitting patients.  Help set up their care, and educate them on the process they will be going through .  It requires a kind person to help them through their fears and concerns.  I follow through until they have completed treatment.  I also do alot of accounting work, book work and banking

lenders.name: Abbie
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to donate a small amount to help other people make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach preschool children with special needs, such as mental retardation, Down syndrome, or speech and language delays.

lenders.name: Karma G
lenders.loan_because: there are so many entrepreneurs in poverty who face serious capital constraints.  Because of poor access to capital many poor entrepreneurs must forego investments that have very short payback periods.  For example, if a shopkeeper can afford to buy more inventory her sales go up, her business expands, and she can pay back the loan very quickly.  Solving the problem of access to capital through microfinance is a very low cost way to help the very poor pull themselves out of poverty, educate their children, and feed their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family with a variety of occupations.  The dad teaches in a university, the mom teaches very young children with special needs, one daughter hires college students to work as teachers, one daughter works in Tanzania teaching young children about aids, and the youngest daughter is in her last year at High School.

lenders.name: Thomas

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a prison reentry program that prepares men for their return to the community. The Fresh Start Program is an intensive, jail-based program of vocational training and group counseling. It is balanced by a community-based component that includes support groups, individual "coaching" and one-on-one assistance in finding and keeping jobs.

lenders.name: Stained Glass Girl

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a very large financial institution who has an extensive global presence.  I started there when I was 20 years old and have been there now for 33 years.  I am in human resources, which allows me to work  with and help many of our employees all over the world.  I enjoy my job and am grateful for it.  My company took a chance on me by hiring me when I was young, not much experience, right out of school.  So that is why I want to give that same chance to you.  I am also trying to start a new business on the side, stained glass, to make extra money for my family.  So I understand how important it is to be self-sufficient and to be able to provide for my family.

lenders.loan_because: My wife and I are blessed to live in a country where safety and abundance is taken for granted. I applaud the work that Kiva is doing.
lenders.occupational_info:
I provide technical consulting to architects and designers for a variety of materials that are used in the construction industry.
I also work with Former U.S. Vice President Al Gore's non profit organization The Climate Project to promote awareness of the looming crisis of global warming. I provide a free version of the same slideshow that was featured in the documentary, "An Inconvenient Truth" to various groups and organizations in my community.

lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager of a customer service call centre for collectibles.

lenders.name: Erryl and Betsy
lenders.loan_because: We think that helping someone develop a business is better than charity, because the benefit is more lasting.  We also see women disadvantaged in many parts of the world and think that helping them develop a business will liberate them.
lenders.occupational_info: We don't work every day any longer and have time to think about how we can help others that still do.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: sharing the wealth we (the US) have is a great source of joy & fulfillment for me & I like the sense of accountability about the interest free loan & repayment approach.
lenders.occupational_info: Founded a 501c3 for spreading Life Coaching in orgs;Currently a Life & Executive Coach, & retired Corporate Exec from the restaurant industry

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help individuals in need from all over the world to help them get a new start on life.

lenders.name: Kevin & Robin Fitzgerald
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell machines that business people use to share information.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I believe in programs which work with individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: After retirement in 1993, I have assisted in developing substance abuse prevention programs in Lithuanian, Poland, Belarus, and Turkey.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Oprah episode with Bill Clinton and the segment about Kiva was so moving that I just had to check it out.  As a women who's scared to take that first step in owning my own business, I hope that my donation will help someone realize their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been a hairdresser for 16 years and absolutely love my job. I feel so lucky to do what I do, helping people feel good about themselves and sometimes just being a shoulder to cry on or a cheerleader, it makes me feel good to know that what I do has a positive effect.

lenders.name: Ophelia
lenders.loan_because: it's my obligation as a citizen of the world to help in some way -

lenders.name: Cherlyn
lenders.loan_because: Its nice to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I help medium and big businesses better understand their information technology operations.
